about_the_game:
-Story-

The foggy, gloomy Chainch Sea is infamous for dangerous waters, wherein shipwrecks happen all the time. Bizarre things often washed ashore on Chainch Village’s beach, drawing travelers to hunt for treasure and a trading place for pirates and merchants. This sea is the borderline that divides eastern and western areas. It is also the final glimpse of an ancient civilization. The mountains and forests surrounding this settlement provide a natural barrier, protecting the descendants of the Momo Tribe and pilgrims who have lived here for generations. The mysteries surrounding Chainch are far beyond understanding. Unexplainable supernatural events often happen in this mysterious land.

Seven knights were caught in the incoming conflict between two areas and cautiously watched the borderline upon arrival. Chainch Village is also the hometown of one of the knights, Lio, who has returned here accompanying his stepsister, Vanina.

If you ever happens to meet a bard from Chainch, they will tell you that “We are all just insignificant stardust. But you are a special one. The Goddess must have plans in store for you.”

-Features-

Lair Land Story 2: Mist of Sea is a Relationship Building Simulation RPG. Players take on the role of knight Lio and live with Vanina in Chainch village. Help Vanina gain and develop some hobbies or encourage her to make different friends. After several years of living together, both of you will embrace all different kinds of endings.

◎Careers and Development

The carrier you choose for Vanina will introduce unique gameplay and plots:

Lady Farmer: Focuses on farming and managing fields and plants.

Town Planner: Focuses on building and managing village blocks.

You can develop a variety of attributes, perks, and skills. Based on the carrier, you will face different kinds of super essential duties and challenges.

◎Stuffed Closets

There are many items Vanina can use to change her appearance, such as hairdos, clothes, pajamas, swimsuits. These costumes are not just about looking good! They will provide different kinds of special effects in-game. We plan to release more costumes for You to use in the future.

◎Parallel Socializing

There are dozens of NPCs in the Chainch Village to interact with. They are good at sharing their stories, but also they have many secrets. Vanina can join their circle to earn their support, while Lio can interact with some NPCs and provide daily assistance as a knight.

◎Living in Chainch

We have created Chainch Village in 2D that has a variety of details. You will never get bored exploring it! Experience the four seasons change during a year. There are plenty of tasks for you to do, including activities in the village such as auctions, mini games,, etc. You can also take a nap at home, focus on researching and collecting items.

Outside, You can observe how people live their lives or just watch the fireflies hovering over the country field while the night falls. Don’t be out when the storm is coming, though!

If you have played the first “Lair Land Story,” we are happy to inform you that “Lair Land Story II”’s content will be 5x more extensive than the first one. There are more than 2000 events, 30+ endings, and lots of rewards for completing the game.

◎Following Plans

New Modes: More game modes to extend the gameplay.

New Careers: The third career will be free, giving you unexpectedly new experiences. We are working on more careers as well.

More NPCs: New characters with different personalities. Not all of them are human!

More Skills and Activities: New fun things to do like fishing and gardening! Get ready to be surprised with our new content!

Major DLC: We are planning to add more chapters. But first, we will focus on polishing our current version.

Japanese/English Localization: This will be a large job for us, but we will do our best to get it done.

short_description: After traveling far to the southern end of Lair Land, seven knights have reached Chainch Bay. Settled in a small tropical fishing village surrounded by ruins, they will spend the next few years building a new life here while facing the most challenging quest they will ever meet.
